4QHG64zz988KBG02IzqefQ.text: Went for breakfast with my daughter, who is 5. So anyone with a child knows it's a time thing with the. Nothing is fast enough. With a picture to colour brought by the waiter kept her occupied until our breakfast came. With was really fast. Pancakes where nice as my daughter wolfed them down and my full english breakfast was filling and delicious

a2y2J65-sd8r9k9YBvyepw.text: This restaurant is a shit! Waiters here are really really rude and cold! They don't care about you and ignore your requests ! They want you to sit on seats quietly. And the manager will not arrange you to the seats you want even they are empty. Stuff there are too arrogant!  Foods are just so so. This is a shit and I will not come again! !,,!,!,!

photos.caption: Photo of Frankie & Benny's - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Fish and chips are very hard to chew! You almost lose your teeth!
Photo of Frankie & Benny's - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Fish and chips are very hard to chew!

YBOIzTOFYh8EJWAJ7jH8Hg.text: Our great mood was ruined by the unprofessional attitude of the waiters in this restaurant. We were ready to order and we asked them to come, they were like " Urhhh I am quite busy right now you should wait." After 5 minutes waiting one of the waiters came, and he said "you seem like you are ready to order, what do you want now?"  We did not argue with them because we did not want to waste our time there. Overall it was an extremely unpleasant experience. Those waiters were too rude.   All in all, if you are traveling and want a good mood, Do Not Dine There! If you want to enjoy a family dinner, Do Not Dine There! If you still have a good impression with Edinburg, Do Not Dine There!

-WPHUIz7fGSHbS1CqFMx_A.text: Waiter(s) forgot our drinks, whilst they stood talking at the bar. The 'pomoddero' pasta with 'mozarella en fresh basil' included 5 tiny tiny bits of mozarella and ONE tiny basil leaf. Hair in the meatball pasta. DON'T COME HERE. Very very disappointed.

photos.caption: Photo of Frankie & Benny's - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Terrible service and food.
Photo of Frankie & Benny's - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

RSIJ4Fujg38hl_cmRgsKww.text: Terrible service. The entire upper floor had ONE woman working every table. Even if she had a better attitude, she still wouldn't be able to provide decent service. The food was exactly what you would expect for a generic restaurant on the Royal Mile. Bland to downright embarrassing.

Mrtid8WxIOdiIpeMccgYAg.text: We absolutely loved Frankie & Benny's. Loved the garlic dough balls and our pizzas that we got to cut however large or small a slice we wanted (we usually don't get that choice in the States!). We loved the fantastic service.
